definition[0]: not reacting to or becoming involved in something in an emotional way
example[0]: Try to take a more detached view.
example[1]: She described what had happened in a cold and detached manner.
example[2]: He appeared totally detached from the horrific nature of his crimes.
definition[1]: a detached house or garage is not joined to another building
definition[2]: a house or garage that is detached is not joined to another building on any side
